overview.title: Date Picker Component
overview.description: Date pickers let users select a calendar date (and optionally a time). Native inputs are preferred for accessibility and mobile support.

js.title: JavaScript
js.description: JavaScript opens/closes a calendar popover, syncs input values, and validates date ranges when a custom picker is used.

best-practices.title: Best Practices
points: Prefer native inputs when possible for platform accessibility and locale behavior.
If building custom, ensure proper roles (grid, gridcell) and keyboard navigation.
Respect locale-specific date formats and first day of week.
Constrain invalid ranges (min/max) and indicate errors clearly.
Support manual typing and parsing when feasible.
